content: Moving to Slide 12, we were to scale our gross profit to $50 million in Q2 2022, up 47% year-over-year, while experiencing the largest quarter-over-quarter expansion in the past four quarters, increasing by solid a 14% or $6 million compared to Q1 2022. It followed the same trend as gross profit, increasing by 47% year-over-year and experiencing the highest quarter-over-quarter growth in the past four quarters, increasing by a strong 16% or $5 million compared to Q1 2022.
